GetSelRailWayInfo.desc: 获取选中的铁路,POLYGON参数先筛选是否和这个区域相交，加快搜索

ROOT.GetSelRailWayInfo: select * FROM( select name,id,ST_Distance(railway_gcj02_single.geom::geography,st_pointfromtext('point({1})',4326)::geography) as distance from railway_gcj02_single where ST_Intersects(st_setsrid(st_polyfromtext('POLYGON(({0}))'),4326), st_setsrid(geom,4326)) ='t' )a order by distance
ROOT.GetRaiWayInfoByPyname: SELECT st_astext(geom) from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG railway_gcj02 where name like '%{0}%'
ROOT.GetRaiWayInfoByPyname_old: select st_asewkt(st_makeline(p)) ,st_geometrytype(st_makeline(p)) from ( select st_astext((st_dumppoints(st_union(geom))).geom) p from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG railway_gcj02 where name = '{0}' )t order by 1 desc
ROOT.GetRailWayLinePolyInfo: SELECT st_astext(ST_Envelope(geom)) from railway_gcj02 where name like'%{0}%'
ROOT.GetStationByRailWayLine: SELECT distinct stationpoint.gid,stationpoint.name from ys_db.public.stationpoint,railway_gcj02 where railway_gcj02.railname ='{0}' and stationstate=1003 and stationtype=2003 and ST_Contains(ST_Envelope(railway_gcj02.geom),st_setsrid(stationpoint.geom,4326))='t' and ST_Distance(railway_gcj02.geom::geography,st_setsrid(stationpoint.geom,4326)::geography)<{1}
